attributes.action: ban all immigrants from coming to the United Kingdom just to get free medical treatment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many immigrants just come to the UK for the free NHS medical treatment. This should be stopped and they should be made to pay the same fees that English people have to pay when they are ill in other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
